Read our story

Our founding

GlamLook is a modest-wear brand founded by our team in 2022.Our online store was founded by like-minded individuals, a group of professionals dedicated to building innovative, smart and easy online shopping solutions. At Glam Look, we guarantee that every single purchase you make will be a seamless process from start to finish. Take a look at our site and get in touch with questions or concerns.

Growth & beyond

Through our mission to provide accessible prices with premium quality options, GlamLook range of stylish outfit have reached the hearts of modest fashion lovers Malaysia.

GlamLook has a wide official distribution channels namely GlamLook.com, Luxe Boutique TTDI and 1 Utama.
